Service was fantastic!  Very, very friendly.  Even though we were out of towners who don't speak Spanish they took the time to explain the menu in English while they were very busy with other customers.  The food was a great bargain, 22 Euro for three courses and a bottle of wine for two.  Only issue for us is that it seemed a bit too authentic for our palates, a couple of the dishes weren't what we were expecting.  Dessert was a highlight though.  All in all a near perfect experience.
